entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
